title: Helping Others Improve -Dynamic Q sucks-

embed.description: This is part of a series, where I try and help others go from Bronze to silver. Heck maybe even gold. Im not the one playing, Im spectating a game. If you are bronze and want some help, let me know.

body: Let me know how the side look, I've gotten mix opinions on the black borders (I need a widescreen monitor).

replies.body: You would ASSUME the premades are more co-ordinated. I am finding myself grouped with premades who are only have a handful of games played together and actually suck harder than solos.

Yeah, these guys didn't seem really in sync.
Apparently they also flamed the hell out of the fizz, which made him play worse and end up not caring about the game.
Hence why Dynamic Q sucks.
And then you have the other side of the coin, where boosters have a field day with this shit cause 5 man premade against bronze-platinum = easy games.
I think the borders look good, didn't notice them to much when was watching it all.
